body: add wiki page to show screen shot of each theme so user can preview the theme before downloading.
author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
title: Show screen shot of each theme
content:
_From [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/) on May 30, 2011 10:25:34_

add wiki page to show screen shot of each theme so user can preview the theme before downloading.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=24_
